CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 12, 1958, pg. 2 reads: "Internal Specialist - An expert in diagnostic techniques in internal medicine, Dr. E.H. Hale, presently chief of medicine at the Veterans Administration Hospital at Leech Farm where he uses complex machines similar to the electrocardiograph detector above, soon will be appointed to a high-ranking position at West Penn Hospital. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. E. H. Hale wearing light colored laboratory coat, turning knob on a diagnostic machine at the Veterans Administration Hospital at Leech Farm, Pittsburgh
